title: Didnt get 2 Graves Chromas
body: Was gold in both Solo/Duo and flex 5's and didnt get the correct chromas for reaching this rank in the 2 playlists. Please explain?

replies.body: I'm double checking now, and it does seem to me like you should have gotten 2 of those chromas. Be sure to write in a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) to our game team so they can be sure you got *all* of the rewards you should have gotten!
